publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World

description.value:
You enhance your performances with delightful magical tricks, going far beyond normal sleight of hand. Choose one cantrip from the following list: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.h7IhypLwItepwhou], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0zU8CPejjQFnhZFI], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]. You can cast this cantrip as an arcane innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up.

Special You can select this feat more than once. If you do, you must select a different cantrip.
